title: AI News Analysis Tool - Deep Intelligence for Every Article
metaDescription: Transform news into strategic intelligence with AI. Analyze bias, PESTLE factors, market impact, and stakeholder influence in seconds. Try free today.
subtitle: Turn Every News Article Into Strategic Intelligence
intro: In today's fast-paced world, understanding the real impact of news is crucial for businesses, investors, and decision-makers. Our AI News Analysis Tool goes beyond simple summaries—it provides comprehensive PESTLE analysis, bias detection, stakeholder mapping, and market sentiment evaluation in real-time. Whether you're tracking competitor moves, regulatory changes, or market shifts, our platform delivers actionable intelligence from any news source.

features.description: Automatic Political, Economic, Social, Technological, Legal, and Environmental factor extraction

features.title: Bias Detection

features.title: Stakeholder Mapping
features.description: Visualize power dynamics and influence networks between parties

howItWorks: Paste any news URL or upload article text
AI analyzes content across 7 dimensions
Get comprehensive intelligence report in 30 seconds

faqs.question: How accurate is the AI analysis?
faqs.answer: Our AI achieves 94% accuracy rate, trained on 2.5M+ verified news articles with continuous learning from expert feedback.

faqs.question: Can I analyze multiple articles at once?
faqs.answer: Yes! Pro and Premium plans support batch analysis of up to 100 articles simultaneously with comparative insights.

faqs.question: What languages are supported?
faqs.answer: We currently support English, Chinese, Spanish, Vietnamese, and Japanese with 95%+ accuracy across all languages.

title: AI News Summarizer - Instant 3-Line Summary of Any Article

intro: Reading hundreds of news articles daily is impossible. Our AI News Summarizer extracts the core message, key facts, and actionable insights from any article in seconds. Whether you're monitoring industry news, tracking competitors, or staying informed on market trends, get instant clarity without information overload.

AI reads and understands the full context

faqs.question: How long does summarization take?
faqs.answer: Most articles are summarized in 5-10 seconds. Longer research papers may take up to 30 seconds.

faqs.question: Can I customize summary length?
faqs.answer: Yes! Choose from 3-line (default), 5-line detailed, or full executive summary formats.

faqs.question: Does it work with paywalled content?
faqs.answer: If you can copy the article text, our AI can summarize it. We don't bypass paywalls but work with any text you provide.

title: Bias Detection & Credibility Checker - Verify News Sources with AI
metaDescription: Detect media bias, fact-check claims, and assess source credibility with AI. Analyze political leaning, manipulation tactics, and journalistic quality instantly.
subtitle: Know What's Real and What's Spin
intro: In an era of misinformation, knowing whether a news source is credible is critical. Our AI-powered Bias & Credibility Checker analyzes articles for political bias, emotional manipulation, factual accuracy, and source reliability. Get instant credibility scores, bias direction (left/right/center), and manipulation tactics used—empowering you to consume news with full awareness.

features.title: Bias Detection
features.description: Identify left-leaning, right-leaning, or neutral political bias with confidence scores

features.title: Credibility Rating
features.description: 0-100 credibility score based on source history, fact-checking records, and journalistic standards

features.title: Manipulation Tactics
features.description: Detect emotional appeals, loaded language, cherry-picking, and logical fallacies

features.title: Source History
features.description: View publisher's past accuracy rate and fact-checking record

howItWorks: Enter article URL or paste text
AI analyzes language patterns and source reputation
Get detailed bias report with credibility score

faqs.question: How is bias measured?
faqs.answer: We use linguistic analysis, sentiment patterns, and comparison with verified neutral sources to detect bias.

faqs.question: Can it detect fake news?
faqs.answer: While we can't guarantee 100% detection, our system flags suspicious patterns with 87% accuracy against known fake news databases.

faqs.question: What sources are in your credibility database?
faqs.answer: We track 5,000+ news sources globally, cross-referencing with Media Bias/Fact Check, NewsGuard, and academic research.

title: Narrative Manipulation Score AI - Detect Media Spin
metaDescription: AI-powered detection of narrative manipulation tactics. Identify spin, framing, emotional appeals, and propaganda techniques in news articles.
subtitle: Measure How Much the Story is Being Spun
intro: Not all news is reported objectively. Our Narrative Manipulation Score AI quantifies how much an article is 'spinning' a story through framing, emotional appeals, selective facts, and propaganda techniques. Get a 0-100 manipulation score with specific tactics identified—perfect for media literacy education and critical news consumption.

features.title: Manipulation Score
features.description: 0-100 score indicating level of narrative manipulation detected

features.title: Tactic Identification
features.description: Detect 15+ manipulation techniques including cherry-picking, false dichotomy, appeal to fear

features.title: Emotional Loading
features.description: Measure use of emotional language vs. neutral reporting

features.title: Fact vs. Opinion
features.description: Distinguish factual statements from opinion and interpretation

howItWorks: Input news article for analysis
AI scans for 15+ manipulation tactics
Get manipulation score with highlighted examples

faqs.question: What manipulation tactics are detected?
faqs.answer: We detect cherry-picking, loaded language, false dichotomy, appeal to emotion, bandwagon, straw man, and 10+ other tactics.

faqs.question: Does a high score mean the article is false?
faqs.answer: No. Manipulation doesn't equal falsehood—it means persuasive techniques are used. An article can be factually accurate but highly manipulative.

faqs.question: Can this help with media literacy education?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Many educators use our tool to teach students to recognize manipulation tactics.
